name: Luvdisc
description: LUVDISC live in shallow seas in the tropics. This heart-shaped POKéMON earned its name by swimming after loving couples it spotted in the ocean’s waves.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's Speed is doubled during rain.  This bonus does not count as a stat modifier.
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed in rain.

abilities.name: Hydration
abilities.effect: This Pokémon is cured of any major status ailment after each turn during rain.
abilities.description: Heals status problems if it is raining.
